General.Name: Zuojiang Technology
General.Description: Beijing Zuojiang Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, production, and sale of software and hardware platform, and boards and chip related to information security applications. The company's products include secure heterogeneous dual host platforms and secure isomorphic dual host series platforms. Beijing Zuojiang Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.

2.Name: Mr. Guang Lai  Sun
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
